A good game that I'd reccomend. If you have anyone to play with, I strongly reccomend the multiplayer. The singleplayer was also fun, the commentary from Glad0s and Wheatley was great. Good writing and great gameplay.
sendos mareos da esta cosa

Overall a great game. The story is compelling and complex. There is brilliant humor and subtle jokes that make you feel amazing when you catch. The Co-op mode is fun with friends with an arguably short but sweet story. 9.5/10, simply because in my opinion the singleplayer goes on for a bit too long, with a cliffhanger ending. Greatly recommended.

Graphics: ★★★★☆
Soundtrack: ★★★★☆
Atmosphere: ★★★★★
Difficulty: ★★★☆☆
Storyline: ★★★★★
Humor: ★★★★★
Game Length: ★★★★☆

This game is frequently on sale as well, meaning you get a great game for an amazingly cheap price.

This game is totally worth it even when its not on sale for $2.27. After you finish the engaging and hilarious story line there are still hours of partner betraying co-op to play. Another great feature is that no matter how much of a smart fridge your computer is you can still run this game on low settings
at 1080p with relatively little lag. I’m waiting for someone to make a GLADOS version of Serie.
游戏很有趣

Eu como programador sempre fui fascinado por puzzle e demais joguinhos que estimulam a lógica para resolução de problemas. E nunca havia me dado conta que a proposta desse jogo era exatamente essa. E não somente isso, o jogo é bem otimizado, é divertido, a história é bem completa, desafiador (por vezes fiquei preso em determinadas áreas e precisei de ajuda) e ainda é cheio de easter-eggs!

O único defeito é ser bem curto. Em poucas horas você consegue finalizar.

Jogão, recomendo demais!
So much better than the first game. I love the atmospher and the whole "what the fuck is this place" feeling I get when playing through and walking around the overgrown levels.
Una secuela hermosa y perfecta

Has a storyline in singleplayer.

Portal2.  it's a nice game and when play the story and get new things to do and new problems, it's just a great game and you will not get dissapointed by buying it. This game is also good if you dont have internet connection and you don't want to play multiplayer that compentivily. This game requires much brain thinking and strategies. You always run into new problems and it really bothers you brains and drives your thinking on a whole new level. This game dosen't need good aiming or fps. This game needs patience and intelligence. The story on Portal2 is awesome and funny. I personally recommend buying Portal2 very much :)

Me encanta, a pesar de tener sus años, es simplemente un gustazo jugarlo. El motor gráfico, lo pulido que está, la jugabilidad es simplemente genial, se siente muchísimo mejor que en el primer título, la historia es muy buena, el humor de GlaDOS es inigualable, excelente título, 100% recomendado
Une histoire géniale (la fin est sublime), une pointe d'humour bien sympathique et des énigmes plus ou moins compliquées suivant les salles. Un excellent jeu !!

Esse jogo até que é divertido e tem umas fases bem dificeis de fazer voce pensar bastante, mas o melhor é o modo multiplayer. Eu só acho que hoje em dia, pelo preço que ele esta custando não vale a pena, só se tiver uma promoção.

有没有和好友玩双人模式的时候，无论谁邀请谁都会与服务器断开连接？名字也都没有中文符号？
玄学解决法：我和朋友玩的时候发现连不上，就去玩泰拉瑞亚，马上回来玩传送门的时候突然就可以玩了！！！Σ(っ °Д °;)っ几次都是这样，屡试不爽，原因不明，莫非是来自东方的神秘力量？？？(⊙ˍ⊙)
（方法由好友LionGheartH发现）
ps：传送门可太好玩了！

这部作品相对于第一部在解谜可用的物品上有不少的增加，唯一的缺憾就是剧情相较第一部略有相似。能让GLaDOS最后承认我是唯一的朋友也无憾于自己参与进这样一个世界观。可惜了Wheatley，他却没有另一个Chell能再给他一次机会。玩过第一部的话挺推荐入手的。
Прошел 3 раза, и не разу не пожалел.
Una obra maestra de cuando Valve molaba, hay que jugarlo sí o sí, sin excusas.
